# JSON list output
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add --created 2026-01-02 Read spec +work
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite list --json
stdout '\[\{"id":1,"done":false,"creationDate":"2026-01-02","description":"Read spec","projects":\["work"\],"contexts":\[\],"meta":\{\},"unknown":\[\],"todoTxt":"2026-01-02 Read spec \+work","createdAt":"[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}T[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}Z","updatedAt":"[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}T[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}Z"\}\]'

-- want.json --
